title: An interesting custom game concept, RuneBattle.
body:
[](http://static3.comicvine.com/uploads/scale_large/11122/111225794/4955781-fight.png)
I have noticed that for the past while, a lot of people have been saying that they haven't been having much fun anymore, so I thought it would be a good idea to make something that I myself would think could be fun. So with that as my reason to create such a mode, I thought up a system that would make an interesting game mode with the restricting nature of not having a proper way to use many things, and this is the mode.

1v1 howling abyss, Using a specific pair of champions.

The champions are decided each week, based on what the most upvoted comment wants them to be.

after matches the winner can screenshot and put them as a response to my comment, and when the next RuneBattle post is created, I will Reveal the winner of the previous week at the bottom of the page in a list of all the previous winning champions.

This Week, however, is going to be based on what I decide, so Its going to be
http://lol.esportspedia.com/w/images/thumb/3/3e/Garen_0.jpg/200px-Garen_0.jpg  http://pictures.dealer.com/n/neuwirthmotorscllc/0175/2cb7418777b00e897e99291608ba2d01x.jpg  http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/69/Cho'Gath_OriginalLoading.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141003113340

If you want to play, I will be hosting matches as often as I can, and here's what you're custom game should look like

RB Garen VS Cho' Gath #

Put the lowest number you can where the number sign is, in the lobby decide who plays what.

Also, don't be afraid to put weird things in the running for next week's character pick, this should also be about teaching people new characters as much as it is about having semi casual matches against people that want to have fun.
